tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_quality_audits (
  audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(50),
  auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
  audit_date DATE,
  compliance_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE AuditRecords (
    audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hospital_id INT NOT NULL,
    audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    compliance_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE Hospital (
	hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
	hospital_location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Audit (
	audit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	audit_date DATE,
	audit_score INT,
	hospital_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (hospital_id) REFERENCES Hospital(hospital_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Compliance (
	compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	compliance_type VARCHAR(50),
	audit_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (audit_id) REFERENCES Audit(audit_id)
)

CREATE TABLE audits (
  audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_date DATE NOT NULL,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  compliance_rating INT,
  comments TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE facilities (
  facility_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  facility_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  accreditation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE violations (
  violation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  audit_id UUID REFERENCES audits(audit_id),
  violation_description TEXT,
  violation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE standards (
  standard_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  standard_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  requirement_text TEXT
)
